pt: {sc}unruly{/sc} {sc}ungovernable{/sc} {sc}intractable{/sc} {sc}refractory{/sc} {sc}recalcitrant{/sc} {sc}willful{/sc} {sc}headstrong{/sc} mean not submissive to government or control. {sc}unruly{/sc} implies lack of discipline or incapacity for discipline and often connotes waywardness or turbulence of behavior.
{sc}ungovernable{/sc} implies either an escape from control or guidance or a state of being unsubdued and incapable of controlling oneself or being controlled by others.
{sc}intractable{/sc} suggests stubborn resistance to guidance or control.
{sc}refractory{/sc} stresses resistance to attempts to manage or to mold.
{sc}recalcitrant{/sc} suggests determined resistance to or defiance of authority.
